name: Steffan Harries
body:
### About Me
I'm a twenty-something web developer from Llanelli now living in Cardiff. I received a BSc (Hons) in Internet Computing from [Aberystwyth University's Computer Science](http://www.aber.ac.uk/en/cs/) Department and I'm a Professional Member (MBCS) of the [British Computing Society](http://www.bcs.org/).

### Contributions
I'm not the author of anything fancy. I contribute code to the [ProTalk](http://protalk.github.com/protalk/) project occasionally after meeting the people involved at a conference. I largely work in PHP using the Symfony2 framework and open source libraries. 

### Contact
Email me at [contact@steffanharries.me.uk](mailto:contact@steffanharries.me.uk).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
